remarks: Every nonzero element of an atomic lattice is greater than or equal to an atom.  ( ~ hatomic analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2011.)
statement:
atlex.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
atlex.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
atlex.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
atlex.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atlex $p |- ( ( K e. AtLat /\ X e. B /\ X =/= .0. ) -> E. y e. A y .<_ X ) $.
$d A y $.
$d K y $.
$d X y $.
